name: Fallen (itch) (LordLoco)
description:
This game is based on a really cool poem just like our game ;) You find yourself in the middle of nowhere exploring a town and the people living in there. During your visit you find very disturbing secrets about this town so you try to escape :000

Please fill in form after playing game so we get cool feedback and distincion grade >:) tyyy <333

https://forms.gle/8YP28Ma75Cn1aQMR9  <-------------

Inpired by Borderlands, Outer Worlds and Undertale :D

Made as a college project based off a poem, by a 2-person group.
